text: Ringo Point is an unincorporated community in Adair County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Ringo's Point was established in 1857, and remained in operation until 1886. The community was named after Joseph Ringo, an early settler. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Adair County, Missouri Category:1857 establishments in Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Ringo Point, Missouri
